data.name: Dark Treasury
data.detailed_description:
Warm up your brain!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1459360/Brain_Break/


About the Game

The world is in danger! Someone opened a portal to the other world, from which an unknown evil escaped. You are a nameless warrior, and your task is to set off on a journey full of dangers to destroy the evil that breaks free. But will you succeed?

Your journey will consist of constant ambushes of dangerous enemies, from which you need to fend off. During the lull, you can always return to the safe camp to save your accumulated coins and improve your skills, or risk everything and continue your journey.

Overcome all difficulties, defeat the universal evil and seal the portal, putting an end to the global threat!

FEATURES
✔ 6 unique locations;
✔ 5 hidden abilities;
✔ Various enemies;
✔ Fight the boss;
✔ Oldschool!

data.short_description: The world is in danger! Someone opened a portal to the other world, from which an unknown evil escaped. You are a nameless warrior, and your task is to set off on a journey full of dangers to destroy the evil that breaks free. But will you succeed?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 124 MB available space
